channel.title: How to make a server 24/7? and another prob
channel.description: I've always been wondering, how do you make your runescape server 24/7? The other prob is that I changed an npc's hp (jad) it was around 220HP and i changed to 800. But then i fought him and he had 82HP I tried it with the Kalphite Queen and the same thing happens, except it was 32Hp instead of 82/ Now I can't get them back to their original HP :( Help

item.title: How to make a server 24/7? and another prob
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:

or go for the 18$ VPS but be prepared to get shutdown by the smallest botnet
